detail_desc: Blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves.
Dungarees in soft cotton twill with press-studs at the front and frill-trimmed straps with concealed, adjustable fasteners.
Long-sleeved blouse in a softly draping weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Slightly wider sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Joggers in sturdy twill containing some wool with an elasticated waist, slightly lower crotch and side pockets. Tapered legs with flap pockets and ribbed hems.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cap in woven fabric with a motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Short dress in a softly draping, patterned viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Printed swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Jumpsuit in velour with a V-neck front and back, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wrapover front with a concealed button. Elasticated seam and tie belt at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Dungarees in stretch denim made from a cotton blend with front and back pockets and adjustable straps with metal fasteners.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a collar and button placket. Slim fit.

High-waisted paper bag trousers in woven fabric with a zip fly and concealed button, and a detachable fabric belt with a covered metal buckle. Pockets in the side seams, fake welt back pockets and wide, straight legs with creases.
Top in a relaxed fit with long dolman sleeves.
Hat in soft rib-knit cashmere.

Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a heart-shaped button at the top and long sleeves.

Studio Collection. Short, stylish dress in a sturdy weave. Deep V-neck with slim mesh trims and narrow shoulder straps. Mesh yoke with a round neckline and deep opening at the back with narrow ties at the back of the neck. The dress is in a straight style with a vertical seam front and back and a skirt with a seam and wide mesh trim. Mesh lining. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Hat in a soft fine knit.
Ankle boots with pile linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a wide foldover edge at the top, long sleeves and a slit at the back. Concealed silicon trim at the top to hold the dress in place. Lined.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist and fake front pockets. One pair with back pockets.
Joggers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, a fake fly and tapered legs with decorative seams and ribbed hems.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Cardigan in soft, pointelle-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Knee-length dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a wide neckline with a drawstring and tie. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Partly lined in jersey.
Sleeveless top in an airy weave with a V-neck, spaghetti straps and embroidery at the top.

Short dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with lace details, an opening at the back with crossover lacing and a concealed zip in one side. Long sleeves with a small opening and ties at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt with a scalloped lace trim at the hem. Partly lined.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and flared hems. The jeans are made partly from organic cotton.

Wide blouse in an airy cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, opening with ties at the front and pin-tucks at the top. Decorative pompom trim around the yoke and down the front, gently dropped shoulders and short, wide, scallop-edged sleeves. Unlined.
Shorts in soft viscose twill with a small, embroidered heart in glittery thread on one leg. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim and decorative bow, and patch front pockets.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Long-sleeved dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a rabbit motif in pile with embroidery and a bow appliqué on the front. Press-studs on one shoulder, dropped shoulders, and a ribbed hem.
Long top in soft, ribbed jersey with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, high slits in the sides and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Kaftan dress with a drawstring waist and sewn-together sides with armholes at the top.
Hi-tops with an adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Hair scarf in an airy, patterned weave that can be tied around the head or neck. Size 16x22 cm.
5-pocket shorts in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a large faux fur pompom on the top.
Poncho in a soft knit containing some wool with open sides. Length at the front and back 80 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft, striped jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Jacquard-knit cardigan in a soft cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and no buttons. Detachable tie belt at the waist and side pockets.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Top in slub cotton jersey with a motif and short, flounced sleeves.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft cotton jersey.
Padded jacket with a stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Short dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with concealed press-studs. Short sleeves and a seam at the waist with a sewn-in tie belt.

Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with an embroidered and reversible-sequined motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Longer mesh layer at the hem.
Sports cap in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a tab and hook and loop fastener at the back. Seamless.

Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Square neckline, a jersey lining at the top, gentle draping over the bust and an open back with lacing. Concealed zip in one side and 3/4-length puff sleeves with covered elastication over the shoulders and wide smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.

Espadrilles in imitation leather with a braided jute trim around the soles, a wide strap over the foot and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Satin linings and canvas insoles. Platform 3 cm.
Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print and flounce-trimmed shoulder straps that meet at the back.
Shaping bikers in microfibre with a high waist, lined gusset, longer legs and laser-cut edges. Light shaping effect on the waist, bum and hips.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and open chest pocket.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Bikini top with underwired, gathered, thickly padded, moulded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow ties that fasten at the back of the neck and an adjustable fastening at the back.

Top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a wide, frill-trimmed V-neck and silicone trim at the shoulders. Short, scalloped sleeves, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared, scalloped peplum.
Adjustable, glittery, on-ear headphones with padded appliqués at the top. Designed to fit mobile phones with a 3.5 mm socket. Length of wire approx. 120 cm.
Slip-on trainers with fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long coat in felted fabric with a tie belt at the waist and no buttons. Welt side pockets, one inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a large faux fur pompom on the top.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a ribbed, rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Padded jacket with a high stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, pockets in the side seams and a concealed drawstring at the hem.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and visible flatlock seams.
Short skirt in grained imitation leather with a regular waist, zip at the back and short slit at the front of the hem. Lined.
Soft smartphone case in transparent plastic with a detachable strap. Can be worn around the neck or over one shoulder. Length of strap approx. 120 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Hi-tops in grained imitation leather with top section and high tongue in imitation suede, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles. Platform 4 cm.
Jeggings in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a small stand-up collar and cut-out section at the front. Long sleeves with wrapover sections on the shoulders.
Leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, a double-layered drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted vest top in ribbed organic cotton jersey.

Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt.
